graphics.utilities

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.utilities.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents 3D object with normals and triangulated faces. The model is split up in different subModel parts each with it's own color
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    OSM Group 5 - DollyWood project
    See Also:
    ModelPart

      • newModelPart

        public void newModelPart(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f color)
        Creates a new ModelPart. The newly created part will become the models active part. Note that you cannot change active part in any way other than creating new parts.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the ModelPart. Note that each part can only have a single monotone color. No vertex painting

      • getModelParts

        public java.util.ArrayList<ModelPart> getModelParts()
        Returns:
        A list of all the ModelParts contained within the model.
